channel.title: How Do I Change The Home In A 508 Server?
channel.description:
Hey all.
I am making a 508 server right now and I'm trying to figure out how to change the home place. Right now it's in some place I don't like so I want to change it to Varrock or Edge or somewhere.
So if anyone could tell me how to do this in a 508 that would be great. Also if you know how, could you tell me the X and Y cords of somewhere near the Varrock fountain or next to the Edge bank?
Thanks - Ags4lyfe

item.title: How Do I Change The Home In A 508 Server?
item.dc:creator: @Ags4Lyfe Ags4Lyfe
item.description:
@Ags4Lyfe wrote:

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change The Home In A 508 Server?

item.title: How Do I Change The Home In A 508 Server?
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

if u mean the place where u first logon when u enter the server then…

search for login.java and open it up and search for

            directFlushStream(p);

there should be coords under that?
if so change them to

p.setCoords(3212, 3428, 0);

(thats varrock btw)

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change The Home In A 508 Server?
